name: The Tennis Pro - Ergonomic G-Spot Vibrator
about: What it is:An ergonomic G-spot vibrator crafted for precise stimulation to explore blended orgasms..Highlighted Features:- Cruelty-free, FDA-approved Silicone: For body-safe and guilt-free pleasure..What Else You Need to Know:This silent vibratoru2019s rounded and angled head offers toe-curling-good massages on the G-area. It has deep and smooth vibrations, four speeds, and two pulsation modes. Itu2019s made of super smooth, vegan, and cruelty-free silicone..Device Size:15.6 cm x 3.2 cm x 4.3 cm.This Device Comes With:- Charger.Due to health & safety reasons, this item is FINAL SALE and cannot be returned or exchanged for cash, credit, or otherwise.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Pleasure fun facts: .-The G-spot is an erogenous zone on the front wall of the vagina, where the internal structure of the clitoris touches the vagina. The stimulation of the G-spot can lead to mind-blowing orgasms...Tips:.-Start by stimulating the external part of the clitoris by applying the rounded head on the hood to build up excitement, with gentle speeds..-Move the vibrator internally with the rounded head towards the front wall of the vagina to stimulate the G-spot..-Explore the vagina to find your spot by using the rounded head. Once you find a pleasurable area, increase the speed, and start playing with the pulsation modes for an intense massage.
